commit.message:
Handle backslash in pp_write_text_as_dot_label_to_stream

2016-04-17  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	PR other/70433
	* pretty-print.c (pp_write_text_as_dot_label_to_stream): Escape
	backslash in label.

From-SVN: r235077

files.patch:
